RelatedSentence: Legislators in an Illinois House committee passed Speaker Michael Madigan 's ( D - Chicago ) plan to place a non-binding referendum on the November ballot concerning a boost to the state 's minimum wage .

Legislators in an Illinois House committee passed Speaker Michael Madigan 's ( D - Chicago ) plan to place a non-binding referendum on the November ballot concerning a boost to the state 's minimum wage .
The proposal was passed Friday by a 12-7 vote , with no Republicans voting in favor of the referendum .
